person.persName: Mercer B. Berry (Clark County and Jessamine County, Kentucky, Millwright and farmer.)

body.p: Jessamine County, Kentucky, millwright and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mildred A. Robinson Berry on May 15, 1845. Father to Landin Berry, Thomas M. Berry, Callie Berry, and Francis Berry. Millwright in Clark County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Clark County in 1850. Farmer in Jessamine County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Jessamine County in 1860. Household owned three additional enslaved persons in Jessamine in 1860.
